author: TaiSakuma
body:
Following https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/4045, this PR removes old definitions of corrected CaloMETs, i.e., _caloType1CorrectedMet_ and _caloType1p2CorrectedMet_.

It also update the test input file for JetMETCorrections/Type1MET
title: remove or prepare to remove old definitions of corrected METs and update the test input file for JetMETCorrections/Type1MET
